arts.ttl: Rangers move top of SWPL on goal difference
arts.sum: Rangers move top of the SWPL on goal difference as four teams go into the international break on 51 points.

arts.ttl: Philippe Clement gives Bailey Rice explanation as Rangers boss backs Scotland kid to bounce back
arts.sum: Rangers boss Philippe Clement believes Scots teenager Bailey Rice will benefit from his half-time hooking against Queen's Park The Belgian boss has faced criticism for starting the teenager at Ibrox last Sunday only to sub him off for Nico Raskin at 0-0 in the Scottish Cup clash.

arts.ttl: Raging Rangers punter DITCHES season ticket as disgruntled bears flood the Hotline to slam Hearts 'shambles'
arts.sum: Robbie Copeland takes your calls and it's far from a happy camp at Rangers bouncing back with a win over Hearts
